meanings.definition: A waterproof fabric treated with oil.
meanings.sent1: The fisherman wore an oilskin hat to keep dry in the rain.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new oilskin jacket for her hiking trip.
meanings.sent3: The oilskin fabric turned a rainy day into a fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: His determination was an oilskin against the storm of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The oilskin material repelled water like a shield.

meanings.definition: A garment made from oilskin fabric.
meanings.sent1: The oilskin coat kept her warm and dry during the storm.
meanings.sent2: He admired the craftsmanship of the oilskin trousers.
meanings.sent3: The oilskin poncho made him look like a stylish adventurer.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an oilskin that protected her from negativity.
meanings.sent5: The oilskin cloak wrapped around her like a protective hug.

meanings.sent1: He decided to oilskin his boots before the hike.
meanings.sent2: She carefully oilskinned the leather to make it water-resistant.
meanings.sent3: The chef oilskinned the pan to prevent the food from sticking.
meanings.sent4: The gardener oilskins the tools to keep them from rusting.
meanings.sent5: The artist oilskins the canvas to prepare it for painting.
